item.description: Teaching 📚 If you are interested in training your personnel on so that you may develop your own efficient business processes and products, we also provide training on “how to use” - just drop us a note. Professional resources: We maintain libraries of resources that have been created over the years either by eg personnel or graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology that have had an association with Dr.
